summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of Brandon Street, from 46th Avenue South to a point 165 feet east of 54th Avenue South; by constructing watermains, and otherwise improving the same, all in accordance with Resolution No. 7526, of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improving district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds."
